channel.title: Sharp HealthCare's Experts in Health Podcast
channel.description: Living a healthier lifestyle isn't just about eating right and exerccising. Staying informed about health issues is another key element of overall wellness. At Sharp HealthCare in San Diego, our doctors and health care professionals are committed to wellness. Listen to a Sharp-affiliated expert discuss new technologies, the latest issues and tips for staying healthy.
channel.itunes:summary: Living a healthier lifestyle isn't just about eating right and exercising. Staying informed about health issues is another key element of overall wellness. Sharp's Healthy Lifestyle audio podcast gives you a convenient way to learn more about health topics that affect you and your loved ones. Simply download the podcast to your portable media player and listen whenever it's convenient for you.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sharp HealthCare offers free Podcasts to keep you up to date on the latest in Sharp news, services and technology.
channel.itunes:author: Sharp HealthCare
